review: I LOVE the Fire Stick. I have an three Apple TVs for my TVs and use them primarily for Netflix, HBO Now, Hulu, etc. I only bought the Fire Stick since it's only $39 and I already subscribe to Amazon Prime. WELL the Fire Stick is fantastic--very fast, wide selection, with well arranged content, especially for the price. Since it also has Netflix, Hulu, and HBO Now in addition to Amazon Prime, I rarely use Apple TV anymore.

I know it isn't my WiFi because my Netflix and Amazon Prime that is on my television still works.

review: I have a smart TV but always felt the quality of the streaming for Netflix and AmazonPrime and as the TV in my bedroom, which is a bit older, maybe right when Samsung first introduced the smart TV, started really acting up I decided for 40 bux, the fire stick was worth a try.  I really love it.  I have cable as well of course and find that I end up spending more time using apps on the fire stick than i do on the cable i pay for monthly.  Great product.
